rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large entrance hall with eco-friendly lighting and natural ventilation. Vastu compliant entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area with sustainable materials, natural light, and integrated home theater space. West-facing windows for Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining area adjoining the living room with eco-friendly finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and sustainable design elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bathroom with water-saving fixtures.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with natural light and soundproofing to maintain focus.

rooms.name: Private Studio
rooms.description: Studio apartment area combining bedroom, living, and work spaces optimized for luxury living with eco-friendly design principles. West-facing windows ensure proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom integrated within the studio, featuring sustainable materials and natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern master bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and efficient water usage.

openings.description: Two-car garage access with eco-friendly design, including electric vehicle charging station.
